summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is crucial to investigate and resolve the issues causing this failure to ensure optimal user experience.
insights: The homepage, pricing page, and blog page have good load times, indicating efficient optimization and resource management.
The "How It Works" page's failure suggests potential bottlenecks, such as unoptimized images, excessive scripts, or inefficient server-side processing.
Addressing the issues on the "How It Works" page can significantly improve user experience and reduce bounce rates.
